Trip Duration.tooltip: How long it will take you to get back up after tripping.

Chance of Tripping while Sprinting.tooltip: The chance of tripping while running.

Chance of Tripping per Point of Damage.tooltip: The chance of tripping when you get a boo-boo, depending on how big the boo-boo is.

Reverse Boost Chance.tooltip: The chance that your jetpack booster may have an uh-oh.

Emergency Boost Misfire Chance.tooltip: IF HIKER'S MOD IS INSTALLED, the chance that an Emergency Boost will...not work correctly.

Scout Misfire Chance.tooltip: The chance that your scout launcher will pull a Soviet Russia and launch YOU.
